game.text: Good morning!  It's a brand new day.
After struggling out of bed, it's time to get yourself in the mood to take on the day.  You decide to make yourself some...
Huh... You really were expecting to feel... something.  Oh well.
Now that you're up, it's time to get at it.  You decide to go to...
Wow, what an experience!  Life truely is for the living, eh?
After a long day, it's time to...
options: Study For Your Code Challenge Retake

game.text: Alas, all is for nought!  We are all destined only for a continuous cycle of death and rebirth.  May you gaze upon reality and see only yourself reflected back for an eternity, for an instant.  Mercy is an alien delight.

night: Study For Your Code Challenge Retake
